mapper.select: SELECT NA_TRPL_C, UP_NA_TRPL_C FROM TB_TR_TRPL_CIF WHERE 1=1 AND NA_TRPL_C = #{TRPL_C}
mapper.sql:
SELECT A.NA_BZPLC, B.CLNTNM, (SELECT TEAMNM FROM TB_CM_TEAM WHERE NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND NA_TEAM_C = A.NA_TEAM_C ) AS TEAM_NM, A.NA_WRS_C, A.PD_YY, A.CSER_CTR_TPC, A.BUY_TXT_DSC, A.BUY_BZ_METC, A.NA_TEAM_C, A.WRSNM, A.WRS_ABR_NM, A.NA_WRS_LCLC, A.NA_WRS_MCLC, A.NA_WRS_SCLC, A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C, A.SL_UPR_TPC, A.INPD_QT, A.MIN_ODR_QT, A.MAX_ODR_QT, CASE A.BYNG_UPR WHEN 0 THEN '0.00' ELSE TO_CHAR(A.BYNG_UPR, 'fm9999999.99') END AS BYNG_UPR, A.SL_UPR, A.VCBT_NA_WRS_C, A.VCBT_UPR, A.VCBX_NA_WRS_C, A.VCBX_UPR, A.SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C, (SELECT CLNTNM FROM TB_TR_TRPL_CIF WHERE NA_TRPL_C = A.SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C ) AS SPYPL_NA_TRPL_NM, A.SPYPL_NA_TEAM_C, NVL((SELECT DISTINCT TEAMNM FROM TB_CM_TEAM WHERE NA_BZPLC = A.SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C AND NA_TEAM_C = A.SPYPL_NA_TEAM_C),'팀없음' ) AS SPYPL_NA_TEAM_NM, A.MNGT_NA_TRPL_C, (SELECT CLNTNM FROM TB_TR_TRPL_CIF WHERE NA_TRPL_C = A.MNGT_NA_TRPL_C ) AS MNGT_NA_TRPL_NM, A.MNGT_NA_TEAM_C, NVL((SELECT DISTINCT TEAMNM FROM TB_CM_TEAM WHERE NA_BZPLC = A.MNGT_NA_TRPL_C AND NA_TEAM_C = A.MNGT_NA_TEAM_C),'팀없음' ) AS MNGT_NA_TEAM_NM, A.CTR_TPC, CASE WHEN A.CTR_TPC IS NOT NULL THEN (FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('CTR_TPC',A.CTR_TPC)) ELSE '' END AS CTR_TPC_NM, A.SPY_TPC, A.TXT_DSC, CASE WHEN A.TXT_DSC IS NOT NULL THEN (FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('TXT_DSC',A.TXT_DSC)) ELSE '' END AS TXT_DSC_NM, A.RVO_PSB_YN, A.ODR_PSB_YN, A.DDLY_YN, A.STPL_PD_VIAPD_DSC, A.STPL_PD_GRD_DSC, A.VIAPD_YN, A.SVS_YN, A.SVS_UNT_QT, A.BOX_BULK, A.WRS_WDTH_LEN, A.WRS_LEN_LEN, A.BOX_WRS_YN, A.DDLY_ST_DT, A.DDLY_ED_DT, A.DDLY_BAS_QT, A.MART_DIV_BKG_ODR_YN, A.SRA_WRS_DSC, A.STPL_AMN_WRS_YN, A.STPL_NA_WRS_C, A.STPL_AMN_DSC, A.PD_YY_AMN_YN, A.NA_ODR_FBID_RSNC, FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_ODR_FBID_RSNC', A.NA_ODR_FBID_RSNC) AS NA_ODR_FBID_RSNC_NM, A.NA_RVO_FBID_RSNC, FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_RVO_FBID_RSNC', A.NA_RVO_FBID_RSNC) AS NA_RVO_FBID_RSNC_NM, A.BOXPE_AQZ, A.NA_USR_SYS_KDC, TO_CHAR(A.FSRG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FSRG_DTM, A.FSRGMN_ENO, TO_CHAR(A.LSCHG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LSCHG_DTM, A.LS_CMENO, TO_CHAR(A.DEL_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DEL_DTM FROM TB_OD_TRTWRS A,TB_TR_TRPL_CIF B
B.NA_TRPL_C(+) = A.NA_BZPLC
AND A.NA_BZPLC = #{NA_BZPLC} AND A.NA_TEAM_C = #{NA_BZPLC_TEAM}
AND A.SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C IN
#{item}
AND A.NA_WRS_C LIKE #{NA_WRS_C} || '%'
AND A.CTR_TPC = #{CTR_TPC}
AND A.FSRG_DTM >= TO_DATE(#{FROM_DATE},'YYYYMMDD') AND A.FSRG_DTM <= TO_DATE(#{TO_DATE} ,'YYYYMMDD')
AND A.LSCHG_DTM >= TO_DATE(#{FROM_DATE},'YYYYMMDD') AND A.LSCHG_DTM <= TO_DATE(#{TO_DATE} ,'YYYYMMDD')
AND A.DEL_DTM >= TO_DATE(#{FROM_DATE},'YYYYMMDD') AND A.DEL_DTM <= TO_DATE(#{TO_DATE} ,'YYYYMMDD')
ORDER BY A.NA_BZPLC ASC
mapper.select:
SELECT A.VAN_C_RQ_NO ,A.NA_C_RQ_NO ,A.NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC ,FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC', A.NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC) AS NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC_NM ,A.CTCPL_TELNO ,A.RQ_CNTN ,A.APV_RQ_NA_BZPLC ,A.FSRGMN_ENO ,A.FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC ,A.BUYER_ENO ,A.RQ_NA_WRS_C ,A.NA_WRS_C ,A.WRS_C_DSC ,A.WRS_DSC ,A.WRSNM ,A.WRS_ABR_NM ,A.WRS_ENM ,A.WRS_TPC ,A.NA_WRS_LCLC ,A.NA_WRS_MCLC ,A.NA_WRS_SCLC ,A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C ,A.WRS_STDNM ,A.TXT_DSC ,A.SMA_APL_TPC ,A.LIQ_YN ,A.COMM_WRS_YN ,A.MFT_NA_TRPL_C ,A.WHT ,A.NA_WRS_UNT_C ,A.NA_WRS_PAK_C ,A.NA_WRS_BRAN_C ,A.NA_WRS_CSTD_METC ,A.NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC ,A.NA_WRS_UZC ,A.NA_WRS_IPO_DSC ,A.VCBT_NA_WRS_C ,A.VCBT_QT ,A.VCBX_NA_WRS_C ,A.WRS_DTL_EXPL ,A.BSC_UNT_DSC ,A.BOXPE_AQZ ,A.RFID_UYN ,A.FOMNM ,A.SLGT_ETR_DSC ,A.DSTR_TER_YN ,A.DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC ,A.WRS_MODIFY_YN ,A.TEMP_YN ,A.PRC_YN ,A.RSP_C_CNTN ,A.REQ_RESULT ,A.CNF_ENO ,A.CNF_DMT ,A.CNF_NAME ,A.NA_C_RQ_REJ_RSNC ,A.NA_C_RQ_STSC ,C.BOXPE_DLVG_UPR ,C.SLAM_PER_FEERT ,C.PMTN_SPT_PERS ,C.WRS_TRT_CMBR_CN ,C.ASP_SL_CNAM FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ A
,TB_GD_WRS B
,(SELECT NA_WRS_C FROM TB_GD_WRS WHERE NA_WRS_C = #{NA_WRS_C}) B
,TB_GD_WRS_BS_CM_RG_RQ C WHERE
A.RQ_NA_WRS_C = B.NA_WRS_C(+) AND A.NA_C_RQ_NO = C.NA_C_RQ_NO(+)
B.NA_WRS_C IS NULL AND A.NA_C_RQ_NO = C.NA_C_RQ_NO AND A.RQ_NA_WRS_C = B.NA_WRS_C(+)
AND A.PRC_YN = 'Y'
AND A.FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC IN
#{item}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_GD_WRS WHERE NA_WRS_C = #{WRS_C}

SELECT R.VAN_C_RQ_NO /* 신청번호 */ , R.RQ_CNTN /* 신청사유 */ , R.RQ_NA_WRS_C /* 상품코드 */ , R.WRS_C_DSC /*상품코드구분*/ , R.NA_WRS_LCLC /*상품대분류*/ , R.NA_WRS_MCLC /*상품중분류*/ , R.NA_WRS_SCLC /*상품소분류*/ , R.NA_WRS_DTCF_C /*상품상세분류*/ , WC.WRS_LCLFNM /*상품대분류명*/ , WC.WRS_MCLFNM /*상품중분류명*/ , WC.WRS_SCLFNM /*상품소분류명*/ , WC.WRS_DTCFNM /*상품상세분류명*/ , WC.WRS_ID_DSC , R.WRS_DSC /*상품구분코드*/ , R.WRSNM /*상품명*/ , R.WRS_ABR_NM /*상품약어명*/ , R.WRS_ENM /*상품영문명*/ , R.WRS_DTL_EXPL /*상품설명*/ , R.WRS_STDNM /*규격*/ , R.TXT_DSC /*과세구분*/ , R.SMA_APL_TPC /*영세적용유형코드*/ , R.MFT_NA_TRPL_C /*제조처*/ , FN_TRPL_CIF_NM(R.MFT_NA_TRPL_C) AS MFT_NA_TRPL_NM /*제조경제통합거래처명*/ , R.WRS_WDTH_LEN /*가로*/ , R.WRS_LEN_LEN /*세로*/ , R.WRS_HGHT /*높이*/ , R.NA_WRS_STD_UNT_C /*단위*/ , R.PAK_METH_DSC /*포장방식*/ , R.PAK_QLT_DSC /*재질*/ , R.ONL_OBJ_YN /*온라인대상여부*/ , R.WRS_BIZTP_DSC /*상품업태*/ , R.PLG_WRS_KD /*기획상품종료*/ , R.FTS_SET_YN /*선물세트여부*/ , R.WRS_TPC /*상품유형*/ , R.LIQ_YN /*주류상품여부*/ , R.VCBT_NA_WRS_C /*공병코드*/ ,(SELECT WRS.WRSNM FROM TB_GD_WRS WRS WHERE WRS.NA_WRS_C = R.VCBT_NA_WRS_C) AS VCBT_NA_WRS_NM /*공병명*/ , R.VCBT_QT /*공병수량*/ , R.VCBX_NA_WRS_C /*공상자코드*/ ,(SELECT WRS.WRSNM FROM TB_GD_WRS WRS WHERE WRS.NA_WRS_C = R.VCBX_NA_WRS_C) AS VCBX_NA_WRS_NM /*공상자명*/ , R.WHT /*단량*/ , R.NA_WRS_UNT_C /*단위*/ , R.NA_WRS_IPO_DSC /*수입여부*/ , R.RFID_UYN /*RFID사용여부*/ , R.NA_WRS_CSTD_METC /*보관방식*/ , R.NA_WRS_UZC /*용도*/ , R.DSTR_TER_YN /*유통기한관리여부*/ , R.DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC /*유통기한표기방법*/ , R.VLD_PRD_CN /*유효기간*/ , R.VLD_PRD_DSC /*유효기간단위*/ , R.NA_WRS_PROENV_DSC /*친환경인증*/ , R.BOXPE_AQZ /*박스당입수*/ , R.LIQ_UZ_DSC /*주류용도*/ , R.CUS_AG_LRG_DSC /*연령대*/ , R.NEW_SSN_DSC /*시즌구분*/ , R.MN1_HSH_WRS_YN /*1인가구*/ , R.HACCP_ATTC_YN /*HACCP인증*/ , R.KC_ATTC_ESS_YN /*KC인증필*/ , R.BSC_UNT_DSC /*가격표시제 단위*/ , R.PR_MRK_WHT /*가격표시제 내용량*/ , R.PR_MRK_STD_BAS_WHT /*가격표시제 기준량*/ , R.PR_MRK_BAS_UNIT /*가격표시제 표시단위*/ , (SELECT DISTINCT WRS_NTFY_C FROM TB_GD_WRS_ONLINE_NTFY WHERE VAN_C_RQ_NO = R.VAN_C_RQ_NO) AS WRS_NTFY_C /* 상품고시코드 */ FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ R, /* 상품등록신청내역 */ TB_GD_WRS_CLF WC WHERE 1=1 AND R.NA_WRS_LCLC = WC.NA_WRS_LCLC AND R.NA_WRS_MCLC = WC.NA_WRS_MCLC AND R.NA_WRS_SCLC = WC.NA_WRS_SCLC AND R.NA_WRS_DTCF_C = WC.NA_WRS_DTCF_C and VAN_C_RQ_NO = ( select max(VAN_C_RQ_NO) from TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ where 1=1 AND R.FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC = '${GLN}' AND R.RQ_NA_WRS_C = '${NA_WRS_C}' )

SELECT LG.NA_BZPLC /*사업장코드*/ , LG.RQ_NA_WRS_C /*신청상품코드*/ , LG.NA_WRS_C /*상품코드*/ , LG.NA_SPYPL_C /*공급처코드*/ , FN_TRPL_CIF_NM(LG.NA_SPYPL_C) AS NA_SPYPL_NM /*공급처명*/ , LG.NA_SPYPL_TEAM_C /*공급처팀코드*/ , LG.BOX_WRS_YN /*낱개/박스구분코드*/ , LG.BOX_WT /*박스중량*/ , LG.BOX_BULK /*박스용적*/ , LG.BYNG_UPR /*매입단가*/ , LG.SEL_UPR /*판매단가*/ , LG.WDTH_LEN /*박스가로길이*/ , LG.LEN_LEN /*박스세로길이*/ , LG.WRS_HGHT /*박스높이*/ , LG.PLTPE_LYNO /*파렛트당층수*/ , LG.PLTPE_SGNO /*파렛트당단수*/ , LG.PLTPE_BOX_CN /*파렛트당박스수*/ FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ_LG LG /* r1상품 관련 테이블 */ WHERE 1=1 AND LG.VAN_C_RQ_NO = #{VAN_C_RQ_NO}

SELECT A.NA_WRS_ATTR_C, A.NA_WRS_ATTNM FROM TB_GD_WRS_ATTR A,TB_GD_GH_WRS_ATTR_ID B WHERE A.WRS_ATTR_DSC = B.WRS_ATTR_DSC AND A.NA_WRS_ATTR_C = B.NA_WRS_ATTR_C AND B.WRS_ID_DSC = #{clc_gubun} AND B.WRS_ATTR_DSC = #{clc_dsc} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND B.DEL_YN = '0' ORDER BY B.NA_WRS_ATTR_C

SELECT A.VAN_C_RQ_NO, /* VAN상품요청번호 */ A.NA_C_RQ_NO, /* 경제통합코드신청번호 */ A.NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC, /* 경제통합코드신청대상구분코드 */ A.CTCPL_TELNO, /* 연락처전화번호 */ A.RQ_CNTN, /* 신청내용 */ A.APV_RQ_NA_BZPLC, /* 승인신청경제통합사업장코드 */ A.FSRGMN_ENO, /* 최초등록자개인번호 */ A.FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC, /* 최초등록자경제통합사업장코드 */ A.BUYER_ENO, /* 바이어개인번호 */ A.RQ_NA_WRS_C, /* 신청경제통합상품코드 */ A.NA_WRS_C, /* 경제통합상품코드 */ A.WRS_C_DSC, /* 상품코드구분코드 */ A.WRS_DSC, /* 상품구분코드 */ A.WRSNM, /* 상품명 */ A.WRS_ABR_NM, /* 상품약어명 */ A.WRS_ENM, /* 상품영문명 */ A.WRS_TPC, /* 상품유형코드 */ A.NA_WRS_LCLC, /* 경제통합상품대분류코드 */ A.NA_WRS_MCLC, /* 경제통합상품중분류코드 */ A.NA_WRS_SCLC, /* 경제통합상품소분류코드 */ A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C, /* 경제통합상품세분류코드 */ A.WRS_STDNM, /* 상품규격명 */ A.TXT_DSC, /* 과세구분코드 */ A.SMA_APL_TPC, /* 영세적용유형코드 */ A.LIQ_YN, /* 주류여부 */ A.COMM_WRS_YN, /* 공동상품여부 */ A.MFT_NA_TRPL_C, /* 제조경제통합거래처코드 */ A.WHT, /* 단량 */ A.NA_WRS_UNT_C, /* 경제통합상품단위코드 */ A.NA_WRS_PAK_C, /* 경제통합상품포장코드 */ A.NA_WRS_BRAN_C, /* 경제통합상품브랜드코드 */ A.NA_WRS_CSTD_METC, /* 경제통합상품보관방식코드 */ A.NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC, /* 경제통합상품유통상태코드 */ A.NA_WRS_UZC, /* 경제통합상품용도코드 */ A.NA_WRS_IPO_DSC, /* 경제통합상품수입구분코드 */ A.VCBT_NA_WRS_C, /* 공병경제통합상품코드 */ A.VCBT_QT, /* 공병수량 */ A.VCBX_NA_WRS_C, /* 공상자경제통합상품코드 */ A.WRS_DTL_EXPL, /* 상품상세설명 */ A.BSC_UNT_DSC, /* 기본단위구분코드 */ A.BOXPE_AQZ, /* 박스당입수 */ A.RFID_UYN, /* RFID사용여부 */ A.FOMNM, /* 형식명 */ A.SLGT_ETR_DSC, /* 매취수탁구분코드 */ A.DSTR_TER_YN, /* 유통기한관리여부 */ A.DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC, /* 유통기한표기방법구분코드 */ A.WRS_MODIFY_YN, /* 상품변경요청여부 */ A.TEMP_YN, /* 임시저장여부 */ A.PRC_YN, /* 경통전송여부 */ A.RSP_C_CNTN, /* 결과수신 */ A.REQ_RESULT, /* 상품등록신청결과메시지 */ A.CNF_ENO, /* 승인/거절개인번호 */ A.CNF_DMT, /* 승일/거절일시 */ A.CNF_NAME, /* 승인/거절자명 */ A.NA_C_RQ_REJ_RSNC, /* 경제통합코드신청거절사유코드 */ A.NA_C_RQ_STSC, /* 경제통합코드신청상태코드 */ B.NA_BZPLC, /* 사업장코드 */ B.STPL_AMN_NA_WRS_C,/* 재고상품코드 */ B.NA_SPYPL_C, /* 경제통합공급처코드 */ B.NA_SPYPL_TEAM_C, /* 거래처팀코드 */ B.PLTPE_LYNO, /* 파렛트당층수 */ B.PLTPE_SGNO, /* 파렛트당단수 */ B.PLTPE_BOX_CN, /* 파렛트당박스수 */ B.BOX_WT, /* 박스중량 */ B.BOX_BULK, /* 박스용적 */ B.WDTH_LEN AS WRS_WDTH_LEN, /* 가로길이 */ B.LEN_LEN AS WRS_LEN_LEN, /* 세로길이 */ B.WRS_HGHT, /* 상품높이 */ B.BOX_WRS_YN, /* 박스상품여부 */ B.BYNG_UPR, /* 매입단가 */ B.SEL_UPR /* 판매단가 */ FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ A,TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ_LG B WHERE A.VAN_C_RQ_NO = B.VAN_C_RQ_NO AND A.VAN_C_RQ_NO = #{VAN_C_NO}

SELECT DISTINCT NA_TEAM_C, /* 팀코드 */ PRGR_C, /* 가격군코드 */ BYNG_UPR, /* 매입단가 */ SEL_UPR, /* 판매단가 */ (AMN_FEERT)+(TROT_FEERT) COMP_FEERT, /* 업체수수료율 */ PHD_FEERT, /* 물류수수료율 */ DDLY_PHD_FEERT, /* 직송물류수수료율 */ TROT_FEERT, /* 환급수수료율 */ AMN_FEERT, /* 관리수수료율 */ PY_FDTCN, /* 지급기일수 */ '0' AS DEL_YN /* 삭제여부 */ FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ_PRGR WHERE VAN_C_RQ_NO = #{VAN_C_NO}
SELECT VAN_C_RQ_NO, FILE_SEQ, FILE_NAME, FILE_SYSTEM_NAME, FILE_SIZE FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ_FILE WHERE VAN_C_RQ_NO = #{VAN_C_NO}

SELECT A.NA_BZPLC, ( SELECT SHRT_BZPLNM FROM TB_CM_BZPL WHERE NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC ) NA_BZPLC_NM, '' AS DEL_YN, B.APV_RQ_NA_BZPLC AS CSER_TRPL_C, ( SELECT CLNTNM FROM TB_TR_TRPL_CIF WHERE NA_TRPL_C = B.APV_RQ_NA_BZPLC ) CSER_TRPL_NM FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ_LG A , TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ B WHERE A.VAN_C_RQ_NO = B.VAN_C_RQ_NO AND A.VAN_C_RQ_NO = #{VAN_C_NO}
mapper.sql: INSERT INTO TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ ( VAN_C_RQ_NO, NA_C_RQ_NO, NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC, CTCPL_TELNO, RQ_CNTN, APV_RQ_NA_BZPLC, FSRGMN_ENO, FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC, BUYER_ENO, RQ_NA_WRS_C, NA_WRS_C, WRS_C_DSC, WRS_DSC, WRSNM, WRS_ABR_NM, WRS_ENM, WRS_TPC, NA_WRS_LCLC, NA_WRS_MCLC, NA_WRS_SCLC, NA_WRS_DTCF_C, WRS_STDNM, TXT_DSC, SMA_APL_TPC, LIQ_YN, COMM_WRS_YN, MFT_NA_TRPL_C, WHT, NA_WRS_UNT_C, NA_WRS_PAK_C, NA_WRS_BRAN_C, NA_WRS_CSTD_METC, NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC, NA_WRS_UZC, NA_WRS_IPO_DSC, VCBT_NA_WRS_C, VCBT_QT, VCBX_NA_WRS_C, WRS_DTL_EXPL, BSC_UNT_DSC, BOXPE_AQZ, RFID_UYN, FOMNM, SLGT_ETR_DSC, DSTR_TER_YN, DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC, WRS_MODIFY_YN, TEMP_YN, PRC_YN, CUD_DSC ) VALUES ( #{VAN_C_RQ_NO}, #{NA_C_RQ_NO}, #{NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC}, #{CTCPL_TELNO}, #{RQ_CNTN}, #{APV_RQ_NA_BZPLC}, #{FSRGMN_ENO}, #{FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC}, #{BUYER_ENO}, #{RQ_NA_WRS_C}, #{NA_WRS_C}, #{WRS_C_DSC}, #{WRS_DSC}, #{WRSNM}, #{WRS_ABR_NM}, #{WRS_ENM}, #{WRS_TPC}, #{NA_WRS_LCLC}, #{NA_WRS_MCLC}, #{NA_WRS_SCLC}, #{NA_WRS_DTCF_C}, #{WRS_STDNM}, #{TXT_DSC}, #{SMA_APL_TPC}, #{LIQ_YN}, #{COMM_WRS_YN}, #{MFT_NA_TRPL_C}, #{WHT}, #{NA_WRS_UNT_C}, #{NA_WRS_PAK_C}, #{NA_WRS_BRAN_C}, #{NA_WRS_CSTD_METC}, #{NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC}, #{NA_WRS_UZC}, #{NA_WRS_IPO_DSC}, #{VCBT_NA_WRS_C}, #{VCBT_QT}, #{VCBX_NA_WRS_C}, #{WRS_DTL_EXPL}, #{BSC_UNT_DSC}, #{BOXPE_AQZ}, #{RFID_UYN}, #{FOMNM}, #{SLGT_ETR_DSC}, #{DSTR_TER_YN}, #{DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC}, #{WRS_MODIFY_YN}, #{TEMP_YN}, #{PRC_YN}, #{CUD_DSC} )

INSERT INTO TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ_TEMP ( TEMP_SEQ, ROW_SEQ, NA_WRS_C, NA_WRS_LCLC, WRS_LCLFNM, NA_WRS_MCLC, WRS_MCLFNM, NA_WRS_SCLC, WRS_SCLFNM, NA_WRS_DTCF_C, WRS_DTCFNM, WRSNM, WRS_ABR_NM, WRS_ENM, WRS_STDNM, TXT_DSC, TXT_NM, SMA_APL_TPC, SMA_APL_TPNM, COMM_WRS_YN, COMM_WRS_NM, MFT_NA_TRPL_C, MFT_NA_TRPL_NM, WRS_TPC, WRS_TPNM, LIQ_YN, LIQ_NM, VCBT_NA_WRS_C, VCBT_NA_WRS_NM, VCBT_QT, VCBX_NA_WRS_C, VCBX_NA_WRS_NM, WHT, NA_WRS_UNT_C, NA_WRS_UNT_NM, NA_WRS_PAK_C, NA_WRS_PAK_NM, NA_WRS_BRAN_C, NA_WRS_BRAN_NM, NA_WRS_CSTD_METC, NA_WRS_CSTD_METNM, NA_WRS_UZC, NA_WRS_UZNM, VLD_PRD_CN, DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC, DSTR_TER_MRK_DSNM, BOXPE_AQZ, NA_WRS_IPO_DSC, NA_WRS_IPO_DSNM, RFID_UYN, RFID_UNM, WRS_DTL_EXPL, FSRG_DTM, FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC ) VALUES ( #{TEMP_SEQ}, #{ROW_SEQ}, #{NA_WRS_C}, #{NA_WRS_LCLC}, #{WRS_LCLFNM}, #{NA_WRS_MCLC}, #{WRS_MCLFNM}, #{NA_WRS_SCLC}, #{WRS_SCLFNM}, #{NA_WRS_DTCF_C}, #{WRS_DTCFNM}, #{WRSNM}, #{WRS_ABR_NM}, #{WRS_ENM}, #{WRS_STDNM}, #{TXT_DSC}, #{TXT_NM}, #{SMA_APL_TPC}, #{SMA_APL_TPNM}, #{COMM_WRS_YN}, #{COMM_WRS_NM}, #{MFT_NA_TRPL_C}, #{MFT_NA_TRPL_NM}, #{WRS_TPC}, #{WRS_TPNM}, #{LIQ_YN}, #{LIQ_NM}, #{VCBT_NA_WRS_C}, #{VCBT_NA_WRS_NM}, #{VCBT_QT}, #{VCBX_NA_WRS_C}, #{VCBX_NA_WRS_NM}, #{WHT}, #{NA_WRS_UNT_C}, #{NA_WRS_UNT_NM}, #{NA_WRS_PAK_C}, #{NA_WRS_PAK_NM}, #{NA_WRS_BRAN_C}, #{NA_WRS_BRAN_NM}, #{NA_WRS_CSTD_METC}, #{NA_WRS_CSTD_METNM}, #{NA_WRS_UZC}, #{NA_WRS_UZNM}, #{VLD_PRD_CN}, #{DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC}, #{DSTR_TER_MRK_DSNM}, #{BOXPE_AQZ}, #{NA_WRS_IPO_DSC}, #{NA_WRS_IPO_DSNM}, #{RFID_UYN}, #{RFID_UNM}, #{WRS_DTL_EXPL}, SYSDATE, #{FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC} )
mapper.sql: SELECT A.NA_C_RQ_NO, A.RQ_NA_WRS_C, A.NA_WRS_C, A.WRS_C_DSC, A.WRS_DSC, A.WRSNM, A.WRS_ABR_NM, A.WRS_ENM, A.WRS_TPC, A.NA_WRS_LCLC, A.NA_WRS_MCLC, A.NA_WRS_SCLC, A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C, A.WRS_STDNM, A.TXT_DSC, A.SMA_APL_TPC, A.LIQ_YN, A.COMM_WRS_YN, A.MFT_NA_TRPL_C, A.WHT, A.NA_WRS_UNT_C, A.NA_WRS_PAK_C, B.NA_WRS_SZE_SEX_C, B.NA_WRS_QLT_GRDC, A.NA_WRS_BRAN_C, B.NA_WRS_PROENV_DSC, B.GAP_ATTC_YN, B.NA_WRS_NACF_QLT_ATTC_C, A.NA_WRS_CSTD_METC, A.NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC, A.NA_WRS_UZC, A.NA_WRS_IPO_DSC, B.NA_WRS_PDAA_C, B.VLD_PRD_CN, B.VLD_PRD_DSC, B.NA_WRS_STD_UNT_C, B.WRS_HGHT, B.WRS_LEN_LEN, B.WRS_WDTH_LEN, B.WRS_SGRT, B.WRS_SDL_DSC, B.WRS_AHL_CN, B.MTRL_STD_THKN, B.CICL_WRS_STD_DMTR_CN, B.CICL_WRS_STD_DPTH_CN, A.VCBT_NA_WRS_C, A.VCBT_QT, A.VCBX_NA_WRS_C, B.CVS_QT, B.CVS_NA_WRS_UNT_C, A.WRS_DTL_EXPL, A.BSC_UNT_DSC, A.BOXPE_AQZ, B.WRS_FL_CN, B.KNET_WRS_NO, A.RFID_UYN, B.TR_STOP_YN, B.TR_STOP_RSNC, A.FOMNM FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ A,TB_GD_WRS B WHERE A.RQ_NA_WRS_C = B.NA_WRS_C(+) AND A.VAN_C_RQ_NO = #{VAN_C_RQ_NO} AND A.RQ_NA_WRS_C = #{RQ_TRPL}

SELECT A.TEMP_SEQ AS NA_C_RQ_NO , A.NA_WRS_C AS RQ_NA_WRS_C , A.NA_WRS_C , '' WRS_C_DSC , '' WRS_DSC , A.WRSNM , A.WRS_ABR_NM , A.WRS_ENM , A.WRS_TPC , A.NA_WRS_LCLC , A.NA_WRS_MCLC , A.NA_WRS_SCLC , A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C , A.WRS_STDNM , A.TXT_DSC , A.SMA_APL_TPC , A.LIQ_YN , A.COMM_WRS_YN , A.MFT_NA_TRPL_C , A.WHT , A.NA_WRS_UNT_C , A.NA_WRS_PAK_C , '' NA_WRS_SZE_SEX_C , '' NA_WRS_QLT_GRDC , A.NA_WRS_BRAN_C , '' NA_WRS_PROENV_DSC , '' GAP_ATTC_YN , '' NA_WRS_NACF_QLT_ATTC_C , A.NA_WRS_CSTD_METC , '' NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC , A.NA_WRS_UZC , A.NA_WRS_IPO_DSC , '' NA_WRS_PDAA_C , A.VLD_PRD_CN /* , A.VLD_PRD_DSC */ , '' ACHMI_LATCNM , '' ACHMI_IGRQT , '' FTLZ_PHAC_IGRDRT , '' FTLZ_NTRG_IGRDRT , '' FTLZ_KLM_IGRDRT , '' FMACH_PATS_CLF_DSC , '' NUMN_YN , '' GEN_LON_LMT_AM , '' COMM_LON_LMT_AM , '' NA_WRS_STD_UNT_C , '' WRS_HGHT , '' WRS_LEN_LEN , '' WRS_WDTH_LEN , '' WRS_SGRT , '' WRS_SDL_DSC , '' WRS_AHL_CN , '' MTRL_STD_THKN , '' CICL_WRS_STD_DMTR_CN , '' CICL_WRS_STD_DPTH_CN , A.VCBT_NA_WRS_C , A.VCBT_QT , A.VCBX_NA_WRS_C , '' FED_PD_METC , '' SNUM_CNTN , '' CVS_QT , '' CVS_NA_WRS_UNT_C , A.WRS_DTL_EXPL , '' BSC_UNT_DSC , A.BOXPE_AQZ , '' WRS_FL_CN , '' KNET_WRS_NO , A.RFID_UYN , '' TR_STOP_YN , '' TR_STOP_RSNC , '' FMACH_FOMNM FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ_TEMP A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEMP_SEQ = #{VAN_C_RQ_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN B.NA_WRS_C IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS ON_REG_YN /* 온라인취급상품등록여부 */ , A.NA_WRS_C /* 경제통합상품코드 */ , A.NA_WRS_LCLC /* 경제통합대분류코드 */ , A.NA_WRS_MCLC /* 경제통합중분류코드 */ , A.NA_WRS_SCLC /* 경제통합소분류코드 */ , A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C /* 경제통합세분류코드 */ , C.WRS_LCLFNM || ' > ' || C.WRS_MCLFNM || ' > ' || C.WRS_SCLFNM || ' > ' || C.WRS_DTCFNM AS WRS_LFNM /* 경제통합상품분류명 */ , 0 AS SL_UPR /* 판매단가 */ , A.TXT_DSC /* 과세구분코드 */ , B.PDM_MFTCO /* 생산자제조사 */ , A.WRS_STDNM AS WRS_STD /* 상품규격 */ , B.ORGPL_NATCD /* 원산지국가코드 */ , B.PD_RGN /* 생산지역 */ , B.AGLVPD_MFCPD_YN /* 농축산물가공품여부 */ , B.MTR_AGLVPD_ORG_ORGPL /* 원료농축산물원산지 */ , B.TOT_CAP /* 총용량 */ , B.UNT_CAP /* 단위용량 */ , B.WRS_UNT_C /* 상품단위코드 */ , B.ADLT_ATTC_REQUIRED_YN /* 성인인증필수여부 */ , B.IMG_EXPL_FL_NM /* 상품상세내용파일명 */ , B.IMG_FL0_NM /* 대표상품이미지명 */ , B.IMG_FL1_NM /* 추가상품1이미지명 */ , B.IMG_FL2_NM /* 추가상품2이미지명 */ , B.IMG_FL3_NM /* 추가상품3이미지명 */ , B.IMG_DTL1_NM /* 나모상세이미지1 */ , B.IMG_DTL2_NM /* 나모상세이미지2 */ , B.IMG_DTL3_NM /* 나모상세이미지3 */ , B.IMG_DTL4_NM /* 나모상세이미지4 */ , B.IMG_DTL5_NM /* 나모상세이미지5 */ , D.WRS_NTFY_C /* 상품고시코드 */ , #{FILE_PATH} AS FILE_PATH , '' AS HTML_DATA FROM TB_GD_WRS A , TB_GD_WRS_ONLINE B , TB_GD_WRS_CLF C , ( SELECT DISTINCT NA_WRS_C , WRS_NTFY_C FROM TB_GD_WRS_ONLINE_NTFY WHERE NA_WRS_C = #{NA_WRS_C} ) D WHERE A.NA_WRS_C = B.NA_WRS_C(+) AND A.NA_WRS_LCLC = C.NA_WRS_LCLC AND A.NA_WRS_MCLC = C.NA_WRS_MCLC AND A.NA_WRS_SCLC = C.NA_WRS_SCLC AND A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C = C.NA_WRS_DTCF_C AND A.NA_WRS_C = D.NA_WRS_C(+) AND A.NA_WRS_C = #{NA_WRS_C}
SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , WRS_NTFY_C , WRS_NTFY_NM FROM TB_AM_ONLINE_NTFY_M WHERE UYN = 'Y' AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY WRS_NTFY_C

SELECT ROWNUM AS SORT_SEQ /* 정렬순서 */ , A.WRS_NTFY_C /* 고시코드 */ , B.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_C /* 고시항목코드 */ , B.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_NM /* 고시항목명 */ , B.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_EXPL /* 고시항목설명 */ , C.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_CNTN FROM TB_AM_ONLINE_NTFY_M A , TB_AM_ONLINE_NTFY_D B , TB_GD_WRS_ONLINE_NTFY C WHERE A.WRS_NTFY_C = B.WRS_NTFY_C AND B.WRS_NTFY_C = C.WRS_NTFY_C(+) AND B.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_C = C.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_C(+) AND C.VAN_C_RQ_NO(+) = #{VAN_C_RQ_NO} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.UYN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.UYN = 'Y' AND A.WRS_NTFY_C = #{WRS_NTFY_C} ORDER BY B.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_C
SELECT B.C_DTL_C AS SIMP_C , B.DTL_C_NM AS SIMP_CNM , B.DTL_C_SNM AS SIMP_C_EXPL FROM TB_AM_CM_CODE A , TB_AM_CM_CODE_DTL B WHERE A.C_TP_C = B.C_TP_C AND A.C_TP_C = #{C_TP_C} ORDER BY B.SORT_SQNO
SELECT BANNED_WORD_NO , BANNED_WORD_NM FROM TB_AM_BAN_WORD ORDER BY BANNED_WORD_NO
mapper.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , A.* FROM ( SELECT A.NA_BZPLC , B.SHRT_BZPLNM AS NA_BZPLC_NM , A.NA_WRS_C , C.WRSNM , A.NA_SPYPL_C , D.CLNTNM AS NA_SPYPL_C_NM , NVL(A.ATL_YN, '0') AS ATL_YN , A.PHD_FCLT_C , A.SRTR_PRC_YN , A.BOXPE_AQZQT , NVL(A.BOX_WRS_C_YN, '0') AS BOX_WRS_C_YN , NVL(A.SVS_YN, '0') AS SVS_YN , A.SVS_QT , TO_CHAR(A.DEL_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DEL_DT
FROM TB_FD_GM_GOOD_WH A , TB_CM_BZPL B , TB_GD_WRS C , TB_TR_TRPL_CIF D , TB_TR_BZPL_TP E WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.NA_WRS_C = C.NA_WRS_C AND A.NA_SPYPL_C = D.NA_TRPL_C AND B.BZPL_TPC = E.BZPL_TPC AND B.BZPL_DTI_TPC = E.BZPL_DTI_TPC AND E.BZPL_TPC IN ( '504' , '505') AND B.DEL_DTM IS NULL AND A.NA_SPYPL_C = #{TRPL_C} AND NVL(A.ATL_YN, '0') = #{ATL_YN} AND NVL(A.BOX_WRS_C_YN, '0') = #{BOX_WRS_C_YN} AND NVL(A.SVS_YN, '0') = #{SVS_YN}
AND A.NA_WRS_C LIKE #{NA_WRS_C} || '%'
AND A.NA_BZPLC = #{NA_BZPLC}
AND A.DEL_DTM IS NULL
AND A.DEL_DTM IS NOT NULL
AND ROWNUM < 10000
ORDER BY A.NA_BZPLC , A.NA_WRS_C , A.NA_SPYPL_C ) A
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , AA.SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C , AA.CLNTNM , AA.NA_WRS_C , AA.WRSNM FROM ( SELECT A.SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C , B.CLNTNM , A.NA_WRS_C , A.WRSNM FROM TB_OD_TRTWRS A, TB_TR_TRPL_CIF B WHERE A.SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C = #{NA_BZPLC} AND A.SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C = B.NA_TRPL_C AND A.DEL_DTM IS NULL AND A.WRSNM IS NOT NULL GROUP BY A.SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C, A.NA_WRS_C, A.WRSNM, B.CLNTNM ORDER BY A.SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C, A.NA_WRS_C ) AA
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NHVANINF.TEMP_OD_TRTWRS_INFO ( SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C, SPYPL_NA_TRPL_NM, NA_WRS_C, STPL_NA_WRS_C, BOX_WRS_C, PHD_WRS_C, WRSNM, WRS_STDNM, INPD_QT, BOXPE_AQZ, NA_WRS_UNT_C, MIN_ODR_UNT_C, TXT_DSC, NA_WRS_CSTD_METC, VLD_PRD_CN, NA_WRS_IPO_DSC, DVY_DSC, SL_UPR, UPR_01, UPR_02, UPR_03, MD_NM, BZTPNM, FSRG_DTM, FSRGMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_CMENO ) VALUES ( #{SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C}, #{SPYPL_NA_TRPL_NM}, #{NA_WRS_C}, #{STPL_NA_WRS_C}, #{BOX_WRS_C}, #{PHD_WRS_C}, #{WRSNM}, #{WRS_STDNM}, #{INPD_QT}, #{BOXPE_AQZ}, #{NA_WRS_UNT_C}, #{MIN_ODR_UNT_C}, #{TXT_DSC}, #{NA_WRS_CSTD_METC}, #{VLD_PRD_CN}, #{NA_WRS_IPO_DSC}, #{DVY_DSC}, #{SL_UPR}, #{UPR_01}, #{UPR_02}, #{UPR_03}, #{MD_NM}, #{BZTPNM}, SYSDATE, #{FSRGMN_ENO}, SYSDATE, #{LS_CMENO} )
mapper.select: SELECT SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C, SPYPL_NA_TRPL_NM, NA_WRS_C, STPL_NA_WRS_C, BOX_WRS_C, PHD_WRS_C, WRSNM, WRS_STDNM, INPD_QT, BOXPE_AQZ, NA_WRS_UNT_C, MIN_ODR_UNT_C, TXT_DSC, NA_WRS_CSTD_METC, VLD_PRD_CN, NA_WRS_IPO_DSC, DVY_DSC, SL_UPR, UPR_01, UPR_02, UPR_03, MD_NM, BZTPNM FROM NHVANINF.TEMP_OD_TRTWRS_INFO WHERE SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C = #{NA_BZPLC} ORDER BY SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C, NA_WRS_C
mapper.sql:
SELECT MD_NM, SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C, SPYPL_NA_TRPL_NM, COUNT(SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C) AS NA_WRS_C_CNT FROM NHVANINF.TEMP_OD_TRTWRS_INFO
AND MD_NM LIKE '%' || #{MD_NM} || '%'
AND SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C = #{SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C}
GROUP BY SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C, SPYPL_NA_TRPL_NM, MD_NM ORDER BY SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C

)

SELECT MD_NM, SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C, SPYPL_NA_TRPL_NM, NA_WRS_C, STPL_NA_WRS_C, BOX_WRS_C, PHD_WRS_C, WRSNM, WRS_STDNM, INPD_QT, BOXPE_AQZ, NA_WRS_UNT_C, MIN_ODR_UNT_C, TXT_DSC, NA_WRS_CSTD_METC, VLD_PRD_CN, NA_WRS_IPO_DSC, DVY_DSC, SL_UPR, UPR_01, UPR_02, UPR_03, BZTPNM, TO_CHAR(FSRG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FSRG_DTM, FSRGMN_ENO, (SELECT USR_NM FROM PT_USR_INF WHERE MB_ID = FSRGMN_ENO) AS FSRGMN_ENO_NM, TO_CHAR(LSCHG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS LSCHG_DTM, LS_CMENO, (SELECT USR_NM FROM PT_USR_INF WHERE MB_ID = LS_CMENO) AS LS_CMENO_NM FROM NHVANINF.TEMP_OD_TRTWRS_INFO
AND MD_NM LIKE '%' || #{MD_NM} || '%'
AND SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C = #{SPYPL_NA_TRPL_C}

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_MOD_REQ WHERE NA_C_RQ_NO = #{NA_C_RQ_NO}

SELECT
A.RQ_NA_WRS_C /*신청경제통합상품코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC', A.NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC) AS NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC_NM /*경제통합코드신청대상구분코드*/ , DECODE(A.NA_WRS_C, NULL, '비표준', '표준') AS GBN /* 신청코드구분(1비표준, 2표준) */ , A.WRS_C_DSC /*상품코드구분코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('WRS_C_DSC', A.WRS_C_DSC) AS WRS_C_DSC_NM /*상품코드구분명*/ , A.NA_WRS_LCLC /*경제통합상품대분류코드*/ , A.NA_WRS_MCLC /*경제통합상품중분류코드*/ , A.NA_WRS_SCLC /*경제통합상품소분류코드*/ , A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C /*경제통합상품세분류코드*/ , B.WRS_LCLFNM /*경제통합상품대분류명*/ , B.WRS_MCLFNM /*경제통합상품중분류명*/ , B.WRS_SCLFNM /*경제통합상품소분류명*/ , B.WRS_DTCFNM /*경제통합상품세분류명*/ , A.WRS_DSC /*상품구분코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('WRS_DSC', A.WRS_DSC) AS WRS_DSC_NM /*상품구분명*/ , A.WRSNM /*상품명*/ , A.WRS_ABR_NM /*상품약어명*/ , A.WRS_ENM /*상품영문명*/ , A.WRS_DTL_EXPL /*상품상세설명*/ , A.WRS_STDNM /*상품규격명*/ , A.TXT_DSC /*과세구분코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('TXT_DSC', A.TXT_DSC) AS TXT_DSC_NM /*과세구분명*/ , A.SMA_APL_TPC /*영세적용유형코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('SMA_APL_TPC', A.SMA_APL_TPC) AS SMA_APL_TPC_NM /*영세적용유형명*/ , A.COMM_WRS_YN /* 공동상품여부 */ , A.MFT_NA_TRPL_C /*제조경제통합거래처코드*/ , FN_TRPL_CIF_NM(A.MFT_NA_TRPL_C) AS MFT_NA_TRPL_NM /*제조경제통합거래처명*/ , A.GAP_ATTC_YN /* GAP인증여부 */ , A.LWCRBN_ATTC_YN /* 저탄소인증여부 */
, A.WRS_TPC /*상품유형코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('WRS_TPC', A.WRS_TPC) AS WRS_TPC_NM /*상품유형명*/ , A.LIQ_YN /* 주류상품여부 */ , A.VCBT_NA_WRS_C /*공병경제통합상품코드*/ , A.VCBT_QT /*공병수량*/ , A.VCBX_NA_WRS_C /*공상자경제통합상품코드*/ , A.WHT /*단량*/ , A.NA_WRS_UNT_C /* 경제통합상품단위코드 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_UNT_C', A.NA_WRS_UNT_C) AS NA_WRS_UNT_NM /* 경제통합상품단위명 */ , A.NA_WRS_PAK_C /* 경제통합상품포장코드 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_PAK_C', A.NA_WRS_PAK_C) AS NA_WRS_PAK_NM /* 경제통합상품포장명 */ , A.NA_WRS_IPO_DSC /* 경제통합상품수입구분코드 */ , A.RFID_UYN /* RFID사용여부 */ , A.NA_WRS_CSTD_METC /* 경제통합상품보관방식코드 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_CSTD_METC', A.NA_WRS_CSTD_METC) AS NA_WRS_CSTD_METC_NM /* 경제통합상품보관방식명 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_UZC', A.NA_WRS_UZC) AS NA_WRS_UZC /* 경제통합상품용도코드 */ , A.DSTR_TER_YN /* 유통기한관리여부 */ , A.DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC /* 유통기한표기방법구분코드 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC', A.DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC) AS DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC_NM /* 유통기한표기방법구분코드명 */ , A.NA_WRS_PROENV_DSC /* 친환경인증 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_PROENV_DSC', A.NA_WRS_PROENV_DSC) AS NA_WRS_PROENV_DSC_NM /*친환경인증구분명*/ , A.BOXPE_AQZ /*박스당입수*/ , A.LIQ_UZ_DSC /* 주류용도 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('LIQ_UZ_DSC', A.LIQ_UZ_DSC) AS LIQ_UZ_DSC_NM /* 주류용도명 */ , A.NA_WRS_QLT_GRDC /* 품질(등급) */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_QLT_GRDC', A.NA_WRS_QLT_GRDC) AS NA_WRS_QLT_GRDC_NM /* 품질(등급)명 */ , A.NA_WRS_SZE_SEX_C /* 크기(성별) */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_SZE_SEX_C', A.NA_WRS_SZE_SEX_C) AS NA_WRS_SZE_SEX_C_NM /* 크기(성별)명 */ , A.NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC /*경제통합상품유통상태코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC', A.NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC) AS NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC_NM /*경제통합상품유통상태명*/ , A.VLD_PRD_CN /* 유효기간 */ , A.VLD_PRD_DSC /*유효기간구분코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('VLD_PRD_DSC', A.VLD_PRD_DSC) AS VLD_PRD_DSC_NM /*유효기간구분명*/ , A.BSC_UNT_DSC /*기본단위구분코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('BSC_UNT_DSC', A.BSC_UNT_DSC) AS BSC_UNT_DSC_NM /*기본단위구분명*/ , A.PR_MRK_WHT , A.PR_MRK_STD_BAS_WHT , A.PR_MRK_BAS_UNIT , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('BAS_PR_UNT_DSC', A.PR_MRK_BAS_UNIT) AS PR_MRK_BAS_UNIT_NM FROM TB_GD_WRS_RG_REQ A, /* 상품등록신청내역 */ TB_GD_WRS_CLF B WHERE 1=1 AND A.NA_WRS_LCLC =B.NA_WRS_LCLC AND A.NA_WRS_MCLC = B.NA_WRS_MCLC AND A.NA_WRS_SCLC = B.NA_WRS_SCLC AND A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C = B.NA_WRS_DTCF_C AND A.FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC = #{FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC} AND A.VAN_C_RQ_NO = #{VAN_C_RQ_NO} AND A.CUD_DSC != 'D'

SELECT A.RQ_NA_WRS_C /*신청경제통합상품코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC', A.NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC) AS NA_C_RQ_OBJ_DSC_NM /*경제통합코드신청대상구분코드*/ , DECODE(A.NA_WRS_C, NULL, '비표준', '표준') AS GBN /* 신청코드구분(1비표준, 2표준) */ , A.WRS_C_DSC /*상품코드구분코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('WRS_C_DSC', A.WRS_C_DSC) AS WRS_C_DSC_NM /*상품코드구분명*/ , A.NA_WRS_LCLC /*경제통합상품대분류코드*/ , A.NA_WRS_MCLC /*경제통합상품중분류코드*/ , A.NA_WRS_SCLC /*경제통합상품소분류코드*/ , A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C /*경제통합상품세분류코드*/ , B.WRS_LCLFNM /*경제통합상품대분류명*/ , B.WRS_MCLFNM /*경제통합상품중분류명*/ , B.WRS_SCLFNM /*경제통합상품소분류명*/ , B.WRS_DTCFNM /*경제통합상품세분류명*/ , A.WRS_DSC /*상품구분코드*/ , , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('TXT_DSC', A.TXT_DSC) AS TXT_DSC_NM /*과세구분명*/ , A.SMA_APL_TPC /*영세적용유형코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('SMA_APL_TPC', A.SMA_APL_TPC) AS SMA_APL_TPC_NM /*영세적용유형명*/ , A.MFT_NA_TRPL_C /*제조경제통합거래처코드*/ , FN_TRPL_CIF_NM(A.MFT_NA_TRPL_C) AS MFT_NA_TRPL_NM /*제조경제통합거래처명*/ , A.GAP_ATTC_YN /* GAP인증여부 */ , A.LWCRBN_ATTC_YN /* 저탄소인증여부 */ , A.WRS_TPC /*상품유형코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('WRS_TPC', A.WRS_TPC) AS WRS_TPC_NM /*상품유형명*/ , A.LIQ_YN /* 주류상품여부 */ , A.VCBT_NA_WRS_C /*공병경제통합상품코드*/ , A.VCBT_QT /*공병수량*/ , A.VCBX_NA_WRS_C /*공상자경제통합상품코드*/ , A.WHT /*단량*/ , A.NA_WRS_UNT_C /* 경제통합상품단위코드 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_UNT_C', A.NA_WRS_UNT_C) AS NA_WRS_UNT_NM /* 경제통합상품단위명 */ , A.NA_WRS_IPO_DSC /* 경제통합상품수입구분코드 */ , A.RFID_UYN /* RFID사용여부 */ , A.NA_WRS_CSTD_METC /* 경제통합상품보관방식코드 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_CSTD_METC', A.NA_WRS_CSTD_METC) AS NA_WRS_CSTD_METC_NM /* 경제통합상품보관방식명 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_UZC', A.NA_WRS_UZC) AS NA_WRS_UZC /* 경제통합상품용도코드 */ , A.DSTR_TER_YN /* 유통기한관리여부 */ , A.DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC /* 유통기한표기방법구분코드 */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC', A.DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC) AS DSTR_TER_MRK_DSC_NM /* 유통기한표기방법구분코드명 */ , A.NA_WRS_PROENV_DSC /* 친환경인증 */ , #{FSRGMN_NA_BZPLC} AND A.VAN_C_RQ_NO = #{VAN_C_RQ_NO} AND A.CUD_DSC != 'D' AND A.VAN_C_RQ_NO = LG.VAN_C_RQ_NO

SELECT DISTINCT A.WRS_NTFY_NM, A.WRS_NTFY_C FROM TB_AM_ONLINE_NTFY_M A, TB_GD_WRS_ONLINE_NTFY W WHERE A.UYN = 'Y' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.WRS_NTFY_C = W.WRS_NTFY_C AND W.VAN_C_RQ_NO = #{VAN_C_RQ_NO} ORDER BY A.WRS_NTFY_C

SELECT ROWNUM AS SORT_SEQ /* 정렬순서 */ , B.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_NM /* 고시항목명 */ , W.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_CNTN , B.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_EXPL /* 고시항목설명 */ FROM TB_AM_ONLINE_NTFY_M A , TB_AM_ONLINE_NTFY_D B , TB_GD_WRS_ONLINE_NTFY W WHERE A.WRS_NTFY_C = B.WRS_NTFY_C AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.UYN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.UYN = 'Y' AND A.WRS_NTFY_C = W.WRS_NTFY_C AND W.VAN_C_RQ_NO = #{VAN_C_RQ_NO} AND B.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_C = W.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_C ORDER BY B.WRS_NTFY_HDNG_C

, A.WRS_TPC /*상품유형코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('WRS_TPC', A.WRS_TPC) AS WRS_TPC_NM /*상품유형명*/ , A.LIQ_YN /* 주류상품여부 */ , A.VCBT_NA_WRS_C /*공병경제통합상품코드*/ , A.VCBT_QT /*공병수량*/ , A.VCBX_NA_WRS_C /*공상자경제통합상품코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('BSC_UNT_DSC', A.BSC_UNT_DSC) AS BSC_UNT_DSC_NM /*기본단위구분명*/ , A.PR_MRK_WHT , A.PR_MRK_STD_BAS_WHT , A.PR_MRK_BAS_UNIT , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('BAS_PR_UNT_DSC', A.PR_MRK_BAS_UNIT) AS A.NA_WRS_SZE_SEX_C /* 크기(성별) */ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_SZE_SEX_C', A.NA_WRS_SZE_SEX_C) AS NA_WRS_SZE_SEX_C_NM /* 크기(성별)명 */ , A.NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC /*경제통합상품유통상태코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC', A.NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC) AS NA_WRS_DSTR_STSC_NM /*경제통합상품유통상태명*/ , A.VLD_PRD_CN /* 유효기간 */ , A.VLD_PRD_DSC /*유효기간구분코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('VLD_PRD_DSC', A.VLD_PRD_DSC) AS VLD_PRD_DSC_NM /*유효기간구분명*/ , A.BSC_UNT_DSC /*기본단위구분코드*/ , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('BSC_UNT_DSC', A.BSC_UNT_DSC) AS BSC_UNT_DSC_NM /*기본단위구분명*/ , C.CNTN_QT AS PR_MRK_WHT , C.UNTP_UPR_BASQT AS PR_MRK_STD_BAS_WHT , C.BAS_PR_UNT_DSC AS PR_MRK_BAS_UNIT , FN_CM_SIMP_CNM('BAS_PR_UNT_DSC', C.BAS_PR_UNT_DSC) AS PR_MRK_BAS_UNIT_NM FROM TB_GD_WRS_CLF B, TB_GD_WRS A, TB_BS_GM_PR_UNIT C WHERE 1=1 AND A.NA_WRS_LCLC =B.NA_WRS_LCLC AND A.NA_WRS_MCLC = B.NA_WRS_MCLC AND A.NA_WRS_SCLC = B.NA_WRS_SCLC AND A.NA_WRS_DTCF_C = B.NA_WRS_DTCF_C AND A.NA_WRS_C = C.NA_WRS_C (+) AND A.NA_WRS_C = #{NA_WRS_C}

SELECT NA_WRS_PDAA_C , PDAA_PROVNM , PDAA_CCONM , PDATTS_NM , PDAA_ZIP , PDAA_LVL_C FROM TB_BS_GC_PDAA WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = '0'
AND PDATTS_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
AND NA_WRS_PDAA_C = #{searchText}
ORDER BY NA_WRS_PDAA_C
mapper.sql:
SELECT O.NA_WRS_C , W.WRSNM , O.PDM_MFTCO , O.ORGPL_NATCD , O.PD_RGN , DECODE(O.AGLVPD_MFCPD_YN, '0', '여', '부') AGLVPD_MFCPD_YN , O.MTR_AGLVPD_ORG_ORGPL , O.TOT_CAP , O.UNT_CAP , C.SIMP_CNM WRS_UNT_C , DECODE(O.ADLT_ATTC_REQUIRED_YN, '0', '여', '부') ADLT_ATTC_REQUIRED_YN , TO_CHAR(O.FIR_RG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FIR_RG_DTM , TO_CHAR(O.LS_CHG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') LS_CHG_DTM FROM TB_GD_WRS_ONLINE O, TB_GD_WRS W, PT_USR_INF INF, (SELECT B.C_DTL_C AS SIMP_C , B.DTL_C_NM AS SIMP_CNM , B.DTL_C_SNM AS SIMP_C_EXPL FROM TB_AM_CM_CODE A , TB_AM_CM_CODE_DTL B WHERE A.C_TP_C = B.C_TP_C AND A.C_TP_C = 'GD0017' ) C WHERE O.NA_WRS_C = W.NA_WRS_C AND O.WRS_UNT_C = C.SIMP_C (+) AND O.FIR_RGMN_ID = INF.MB_ID
AND INF.NA_TRPL_C IN
#{item}
AND O.NA_WRS_C LIKE #{NA_WRS_C} || '%'
AND TO_CHAR(O.FIR_RG_DTM) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{FROM_DATE},'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{TO_DATE} ,'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_CHAR(O.LS_CHG_DTM) BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{FROM_DATE},'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{TO_DATE} ,'YYYYMMDD')
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT A.NA_BZPLC, B.CLNTNM FROM TB_FD_IM_TRPL A , TB_TR_TRPL_CIF B WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_TRPL_C AND A.NA_TRPL_C IN (SELECT DISTINCT NA_TRPL_C FROM TB_FD_IM_TRPL WHERE DDLY_AGCY_DSC = '1') AND B.NA_USR_SYS_KDC IN ('54', '52')
